message: Let's make a deal. I get $60, you get $40. It's a fair offer considering the inflation.
I think we can do better. Let's split it 55/45. It's fair considering the inflation and it gets us to an agreement faster.
Bob, let's be realistic. This is the last chance for you to get a decent share. I'm offering a 50/50 split.  The value will only decrease from here.
